column5: WOW!! what a day... I woke up at 3am after about 3 hours of light sleep wired to go.... got my stuff stuffed into the truck and headed over to Loonietunes place (Kelvin is about 3 minutes from me) we loaded my stuff into his car and we were on the road by 4am...Thanks for the ride Kelvin!!! your a class act! We stopped at Fish N' Ontario and picked up a few items... and let me tell you... I AM GOING SHOPPING WITH HIM AGAIN!!! WOW!!!!! We made Innisfil in about two hours and started to help Moe and Ron and the others get things setup... Man were they every ready to hold this event!! I gotta say it was well run and very well organized, Thanks to Maureen for starting this and to EVERYONE that helped make it a success THANK YOU! I had a blast!!!, I got to meet some old friends and make a couple new ones... and ofcourse made an arse outta myself from time to time...(expected I know..!) Ok after helping out a bit I got registered and headed out onto the ice.... It was a chilly one this morning out there for sure... I only saw two little perch iced between all of us!!! Ok here are a few pics... Here is FishnSled! http://photobucket.com"'>http://photobucket.com"'>http://photobucket.com"'>http://photobucket.com"'>http://photobucket.com"'>http://photobucket.com"'>http://photobucket.com" target="_blank"> And here is HeadHunter Here is Irishfield And Joey Here is Paul trying to convince me it was really that big!! Last years champ Terry! and here is Carp posing with his banner due to his lack of cathcing.....like the rest of us!! And here is one of the fish I saw iced All in all a GREAT day, with some great people!... but man am I tired! Gerritt
Great to see everyone having a great time!
Don't let Gerritt fool you about his broken hand,   that guy has grip like grizzly bear. Good to have finally met you Gerritt!
well done everybody,looks like everyone had a hoot,...cheers
LOL and that is my bad hand.... ahh the life of a tradesperson lol!   Nice to have met you too brother!   Gerritt.
Good report Gerritt. Its good to see some pictures of people that I yak to as well. Looks like you had a decent day to fish too.
PS.... watch the news tonight!! @ 6pm.... Uhmmm A-Channel or VR or something the champ of the tourny was interviewed!.. I wont say who it was though....   Gerritt.

Great seein you again Gerritt and all the others throughout the day. Since we were all fishin together I may as well add my pictures here in this thread. I too left home with less than 3 hours sleep...crawling out of a warm bed, with a warm women and asking myself "what the hell are you doing"? Running into Joey and Tybo in the parking lot and getting my "Joey hug" reminded me of what it's all about. Good friends and good times. We headed out, after registering, and saying good morning to Ron/Cliff/Kelvin/Roger/JR/Maureen etc and started looking for the most dressed out ATV on the ice. This would lead us to last years champ Terry on the SPOT...and we found him...and I think he lied about the SPOT ! LOL  Here's Terry ready to dawn his metal helmut and lance...talking to Lady Walleye    Headhunter and Fishnsled    Joey and Gerritt    Cory and Heather came along and joined us early into the morning    Cliff and his little one..what an age to start out! Eager to fish and no whinning from this one..    Remo preparing for photoshop work..    Good seeing everyone/chatting back at the lunch/prize draw. Got to talk with most, but missed many I'm sure. Great seeing/talking with all those I did and hopefully will catch some of the other board members at future G2G'rs
Just great...
I'm glad it was a good day for everyone, couldn't make it this year but hopefully next year.

Hey there Gerritt!!  It was awesome meeting you finally.  You are very much the great guy in person as you are here on this board!!  Thanks a ton for the goodies...it's MUCH appreciated!  That's a great offer accompanying you on your boat as well.....it will be great seeing everyone again up at Lakair.  Cliff and Carole
Great seeing you again Gerritt.  A pleasure as always.  Great pics from both you and Wayne (hug).  Joey

Gerritt, great to finally meet you! Actually, really great to see some now familiar faces, meet some new folks and all in all, laugh the morning away! Someone mentioned, when we were packing up, how quickly the morning went by! Time does fly when your having fun and it goes by even faster when your laughing! Many thanks to all who worked so hard to put such a fantastic day together for us! Big Clff, those sausages were awesome! Already lookin forward to the Lakair GTG! I know we'll get more fish! HH
yup ' good day on the ice..I had to look real hard to see my fish in that picture//could you have photoshopped it....lol
BTW -Terry, I'm following someone else next year! HH
Great pictures and reports! LOL It would take me a week to get that many clothes on!
Great post, Gerritt,  thanks.  A  beauty of a day,  looks like.   Pikie cleaned up I understand, at least with enough perch for a fish fry.  Wish I coulda been there for sure.
Good deal Garrett and Wayne.  Thanks for the pics  Whopper

Looks like an awesome day great to see you all doin a great deed for Tyler.To Gerritt Maureen and all the other volunteers who got there very early .You all are great volunteers!  The OFC family is growing you are all amazing people. Mike
Vantastic to see you all had such a great time.....Just awesome....Sorry missed it.......  & loved the pictures.
